plot: A married woman takes on a lover during the day while her husband is hard at work. Her eleven year old son finds out that his mother is having an affair and decides to benefit from his mothers indecent behavior.
title: It Is Dark in Here
plot_es: A married woman takes on a lover during the day while her husband is hard at work. Her eleven year old son finds out that his mother is having an affair and decides to benefit from his mothers indecent behavior.
plot_en: A married woman takes on a lover during the day while her husband is hard at work. Her eleven year old son finds out that his mother is having an affair and decides to benefit from his mothers indecent behavior.
